gcci.text: With H100 pricing at $3.13/hour reflecting constrained supply and premium positioning amid ongoing chip export controls, capex-heavy deployments signal a strategic bet on scarcity value rather than cost optimization.

gtpi.text: At $1.47 per million input tokens, DeepSeek's aggressive pricing strategy is compressing API margins while forcing competitors to either match rates or differentiate through model specialization and efficiency gains.

gagl.text: AI infrastructure's 120 TWh annual energy demand equivalent to powering 11 million homes highlights the urgency for nuclear partnerships and grid modernization to prevent capacity bottlenecks as compute scales.

aipi.text: While AI investment velocity remains robust, the confluence of hardware scarcity pricing, margin compression in API services, and energy constraints creates a delicate equilibrium between growth acceleration and bubble formation.
